tool.name: MACS2 filterdup
tool.description: Remove duplicate reads at the same position
tool.command:
macs2 filterdup -i "${ infile }" -o temp_outfile
--format '${ infile.extension.upper() }' @effective_genome_size@ @tag_size@ --pvalue "${ pvalue }" #if str( $keep_dup_options.keep_dup_options_selector ) == "user": --keep-dup "${ keep_dup_options.user_keepdup }" #else --keep-dup "${ keep_dup_options.keep_dup_options_selector }" #end if ; mv temp_outfile "${ outfile }"

param.name: pvalue
param.label: Pvalue cutoff for binomial distribution test
